com.poesys.db.dao.query

Class QueryByKey<T extends IDbDto>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.db.dao.query.QueryByKey<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of IDbDto to query
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IQueryByKey<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    QueryCacheByKey, QueryDatabaseCacheByKey, QueryMemcachedByKey

    public class QueryByKey<T extends IDbDto>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IQueryByKey<T>

    An implementation of the IQueryByKey interface that implements the basic elements of a query by primary key. The class creates data transfer objects (DTOs) with a Strategy-pattern object that contains the SQL required to query the data, and the query method is a factory method that produces a single data transfer object containing the data from the database, including any nested objects. The DTO should be thread-safe if it is going to be cached or otherwise used in a multi-threaded environment.

    Use an IDtoFactory class to generate the appropriate kind of object (cached or direct) om the IKeyQuerySql implementation.

    Author:
    Robert J. Muller
    See Also:
    IDbDto, IPrimaryKey, IDaoFactory, IKeyQuerySql

      • queryByKey

        public T queryByKey(IPrimaryKey key)
        Description copied from interface: IQueryByKey
        Query a DTO by the key of the object expressed through the same type of DTO.
        Specified by:
        queryByKey in interface IQueryByKey<T extends IDbDto>
        Parameters:
        key - the primary key with which to query an object; generic parameter must be a concrete implementation of IPrimaryKey
        Returns:
        a new DTO with the queried object

      • getRunnableQuery

        protected java.lang.Runnable getRunnableQuery(IPrimaryKey key)
        Create a runnable query object that runs within a PoesysTrackingThread. The run method checks the cache for the DTO. If it is cached, it gets it from the cache; if not, it queries the object from the database. The method then queries nested objects. All these activities happen in a single run of the query in the tracking thread.
        Parameters:
        key - the primary key of the DTO
        Returns:
        the runnable query

      • getDto

        protected void getDto(IPrimaryKey key,
          PoesysTrackingThread thread)
        Get a DTO based on a primary key value using the current tracking thread. Store the DTO in the tracking thread.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to look up
        thread - the tracking thread

      • setExpiration

        public void setExpiration(int expiration)
        Description copied from interface: IQueryByKey
        Set the expiration of objects queried by the queryByKey method. This setter allows you to change the expiration from the default value set by the factory.
        Specified by:
        setExpiration in interface IQueryByKey<T extends IDbDto>
        Parameters:
        expiration - the time in milliseconds until the object expires in the cache
